battle_start: You dare defy the tide? The sea’s expansion is inevitable!
Witness Kyogre’s might—a world reborn in waves!
battle_won: Your extinction fuels the oceanic rebirth!
The sea swallows all weakness. Even yours.
done_looser: A flawed current… but Team Aqua’s storm rages on.
done_winner: Another landrat drowned. The sea claims all.
Your existence… a ripple in our tsunami.
